title: LF GOLD+ MID/SUPP FOR RANKED 5S TEAM
body:
Hey there ever wanted to join a team that actually stays together, improves and plays in leagues as well as tournaments and haves fun together while doing all this? please keep reading.
,
,
,
,
Hey there i am leader of a team looking to recruit some players who wanna improve at the game but need a fun environment to do so. This team is also be a competitive team looking to join tournaments, leagues and scrimming teams we see fit to. At some point i will be getting us a coach to help improve even more in our micro and.or macro play. This team currently does have a shot caller, so we are not in need of one.
,
,
,
Requirements to join the team

Constructive attitude
No negative nancy's
Mic with discord
Own most of the champions in the game
Be willing to learn champions or strategies that team wants to play or thinks is strong right now
,
,
,
,
If you are still reading this far great! Still wanting to try out for the team? Fill out the app below we and we will get back to you, we are running tryouts everyday until we a finalized roster. You will be given more then one game if we see it necessary.
,
,
Application

Ign:
role:
Current rank:
Best 3 champions in main role:
Age:
When are you free to play:
Tell me one thing about how you play:

,
,
,
,
Thank you for making it all the way through that. Hope to see you post soon and ill will contact you for a tryout when we have time!

replies.body:
Ign: Dove9
role: Support
Current rank: S4
Best 3 champions in main role: Braum, Morgana, Nami (good Leona, Thresh, and decent Bard)
Age:30
When are you free to play: Any evening and weekends
Tell me one thing about how you play: I play around my ADC. I can play extremely aggressive or defensive depending on what is needed. I mostly just try to cc for adc.
bump still looking for a support
